sentences.en: A specific type of express trust is a discretionary trust.
sentences.cn: 任意决定的信托是一种特别的明示信托.

sentences.en: Air Liquide's Mr Potier refers to the cutting of all discretionary expenses.
sentences.cn: 法国液化空气公司的博天举出的例子是对所有可自由支配支出的削减.

sentences.en: Any discretionary order placed by Broker for a customer.
sentences.cn: 任何由经纪人为客户开立的全权委托订单.

sentences.en: Any payments are discretionary, non - binding and revocable for future years.
sentences.cn: 所有支付均为酌情支付, 无附加条件且将来几年可撤销.

sentences.en: Check whether you are entitled to a discretionary grant for your course.
sentences.cn: 确定你是否有权酌情行事。

sentences.en: Is this an area that is purely and legitimately discretionary?
sentences.cn: 这个领域是否是完全可以自由裁量的,这种自由裁量权是否合法?

sentences.en: Magistrates were given wider discretionary powers.
sentences.cn: 地方法官被赋予了更广泛的自由决定权。

sentences.en: Research on discretionary power to exclude power is great meaningful.
sentences.cn: 证据排除裁量权的研究意义明显.

sentences.en: That trend in discretionary spending has become known as the lipstick indicator.
sentences.cn: 这种自由支配的个人开销(非主要消费)的现象就叫“口红指标”.

sentences.en: The commission has discretionary power to award extra funds.
sentences.cn: 委员会拥有授予额外资金的自由权力.

sentences.en: The courts'application of the doctrine is highly discretionary, but a few generalizations can be made.
sentences.cn: 法院对此理论的运用有高度的自由裁量权, 但也可使其具有普遍化特点.

sentences.en: The enactment of this regulation gives us discretionary power.
sentences.cn: 这个法规的颁布,犹如给我们配备了上方宝剑.

sentences.en: The executive directors are entitled to a discretionary Bonus.
sentences.cn: 本公司执行董事可获自由决定之红利.

sentences.en: The judge has the power to make discretionary awards.
sentences.cn: 法官有权自行作出裁决,决定赔偿额.

sentences.en: With reduced incomes, only cutting discretionary spending can produce higher savings.
sentences.cn: 在收入减少的情况下, 只有削减可自由支配的支出才能产生更高的储蓄.

words.tran_cn: 任意的（等于discretionary）；自由决定的
自由裁量权；谨慎；判断力；判定；考虑周到

phrases.tran_cn: 可自由支配的个人开支

trans.tran_cn: 任意的，自由决定的，酌情行事的，便宜行事的
trans.tran_en: not controlled by strict rules, but decided on by someone in a position of authority
